description:
Ogata believes immersion therapy will help Ogi no existent problem with goats.  The Don uses his mystical powers to scam tourist and set a masterful trap. 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Goat Park Revelry Case / Don Power Spot Conspiracy Case
Yagi En Mankitsu Jiken / Shuryou Power Spot Inbou Jiken
ヤギ園満喫事件 / 首領パワースポット陰謀事件
